summary:
This mod makes Dead Thrall \"safely\", NPCs will not worry about your walking dead or atronach.
Corpses once raised with Dead Thrall spell WILL NOT DISAPPEAR!
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes Dead Thrall \"safely\", NPCs will not worry about your walking dead or atronach.

v1.1 - corpses once raised with Dead Thrall spell WILL NOT DISAPPEAR! Now you can store NPCs     with needed stats and combat style.

However, they may respawn at the place where they were killed. If you have older version of this plugin, first uninstall it.

update - World Events related corpses, such as NPCs you met at the road(Thieves, Mercenaries, Thalmor patrols), will disappear dispite of my changes. NPCs from caves and other dungeons stay with you forever.
author: romperpomper
